name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
After the "Minnan Wolf Reversal" incident broke out, almost all Taiwanese Internet celebrities on Douyin in China have become the target of doubts from netizens.
Among them, "Mai Gou 886" even released several clarification videos in one day. Netizens said: "Dog brother is obviously panicking"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, some netizens sent private messages to the Farmers' Daily, asking whether it really thought about farmers?
Some netizens were blocked by the Farmers' Daily for this reason.
Currently, the Farmers' Daily has enabled the "only allow fans to comment" function.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 3 (Released) Inner Mongolia. Late at night, senior high school students were still studying. One student slumped on the floor, staring at the ceiling in a daze.
December 2, Hefei, Anhui. At 12:30 in the morning, the child hadn't finished his homework yet, and he broke down crying anxiously. His mother comforted him: 'Hurry up, it's okay if you don't finish it.'
Netizens replied: Only by letting go of yourself can you get ashore.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Going home"
On December 8, with the fall of the Assad regime, thousands of Syrian refugees are returning to their homeland.
This caused congestion on the border between Türkiye and Syria.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to a Kremlin source, Assad and his family have arrived in Moscow, and Russia has provided them with asylum for humanitarian reasons, according to Russia's TASS news agency.
"Russia has always advocated a political solution to the Syrian crisis. We insist on resuming UN-mediated negotiations," the source said.
"Russian officials are in contact with representatives of the Syrian armed opposition, and the opposition leaders have guaranteed the security of Russia's military bases and diplomatic missions on Syrian territory," the source added.
